      • KyroListener

        public KyroListener​(java.util.Queue<ClientEvent> queue,
                    java.util.Map<com.esotericsoftware.kryonet.Connection,​java.util.UUID> con)
        Create new listener which push message to the queue and register client connection to the con Queue is assume to be thread-safe con will always be lock when there's an operation
        Parameters:
        queue - client message storage queue
        con - client UUID mapping storage
